summary: An insurance investigator arrives at a creepy mansion to protect a millionaire who has had death threats made against him.
cast: Jack Haley|Jean Parker|Bela Lugosi|Blanche Yurka|Lyle Talbot|Douglas Fowley|Fay Helm|Bernard Nedell|Lucien Littlefield|Dorothy Granger|Maxine Fife|William Edmunds|Lyle Latell|Ralph Peters|Bob Reeves
title: One Body Too Many
